descriptionHtml:
Un seguidor basado en mi personaje, es totalmente independiente a los argonianos, no afectara sus texturas y es un adelanto de una raza Draconiana en el que estoy trabajando. hay dos versiones el simple y el que requiere dawnguard y dragonborn DLC.

A follower based on my character, is totally independent to the Argonians, will not affect their textures and is an advance of a Draconian race in which I am working. there are two versions the simple and the one that requires dawnguard and dragonborn DLC.
[b]
